RentSpree is the leading home rental software in the US and helps hundreds of thousands of renters connect with landlords each year. Our company has more than doubled in growth annually for the past 6 years and we have no plans of stopping. We have a mission-driven culture determined to transform the residential rental industry. RentSpree's award-winning software powers rental transactions for a who's-who list of 300+ real estate companies, including some of the largest organizations in the nation.RentSpree is a place where you will grow alongside the company while collaborating within your team to have a meaningful impact on RentSpree's future.We're seeking a skilled and experienced Senior Manager, Data Analytics. This critical role entails leading our team of data analysts to deliver accurate and reliable insights to support our strategic objectives. The ideal candidate will possess a strong understanding of data analysis methodologies and tools, excellent leadership and communication skills, and be committed to fostering a data-driven culture within our organization.Responsibilities:Manage a team of data analysts and ensure the team provides accurate, reliable, and insightful data to support the company's strategic objectivesDevelop and implement data analysis methodologies, tools, and processes to support the company's business intelligence needsCollaborate with the executive team to create reports and presentations that effectively communicate insights and recommendations based on data analysisMentor and coach team members to build their data analysis skills and knowledgeFoster a data-driven culture within the company by promoting the use of data and analytics to support decision-makingDetermine the company's data analytics strategy and direction, including developing data analytics goals and objectivesEnsure report quality and integrity by reviewing and verifying the accuracy of data analysis performed by the teamCollaborate with other departments and teams to ensure that data analysis is integrated into all aspects of the company's operationsDevelop a strong understanding of the company's business processes and objectives, and use this knowledge to inform data analysis and provide actionable insights to decision-makersRequirements:Bachelor's or Master's degree in a relevant field such as data science, statistics, computer science, or business administration5-7+ years of experience in data analysis and management, preferably in a similar industry3+ years of experience in a management or supervisory role, preferably in a data analysis or related fieldStrong understanding of data analysis methodologies, statistical analysis, data visualization, and data modelingProficiency in tools such as SQL, Python, R, Excel, Tableau, and other business intelligence toolsAbility to motivate and manage a team of data analysts, set goals and objectives, and provide regular feedback to team membersStrong understanding of the company's business objectives and how data analysis can support those objectivesAbility to develop a data analytics strategy and direction that aligns with the company's goalsExperience in fostering a data-driven culture within an organization is highly valuedThis role is fully remote and based in the US, with the Senior Manager, Data Analytics working closely with teams in two locations, the US and Thailand. The ideal candidate will have a flexible mindset, excellent communication skills, and the ability to work collaboratively with team members in different time zones. If you are passionate about data analytics, thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment, and are looking to join a company that is making a real difference in the real estate industry, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity as our Senior Manager, Data Analytics at RentSpree.
